not_found.name: Unknown
description: Unable to find the requested ioun stone.

dull_gray_stone.name: Dull Gray Stone
description: **Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12 gp, 5 sp
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12 gp, 5 sp

These are ioun stones that have been burned out or otherwise rendered all but powerless. They retain the ability to float and orbit, and are useful as the target of spells such as continual flame, daylight, and silence, allowing you to keep your hands free. They may be any shape (cabochon, disk, ellipsoid, and so on).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12 gp, 5 sp

amethyst_pyramid.name: Amethyst Pyramid
description: This stone grants you the ability to pass undetected before undead as if under the effects of a hide from undead spell. Unintelligent undead automatically can't see you, and intelligent undead receive a single DC 12 Will save to notice you despite the stone's effects. If you attempt to channel positive energy, turn or command undead, touch an undead creature, or attack any creature (even with a spell), the stone's effects are negated for 1 hour.
+2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks against undead.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [hide from undead](spell/hide_from_undead), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
This stone functions as a normal amethyst pyramid ioun stone, but against undead you take a -1 penalty to AC and on saves.
+2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks against undead.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [hide from undead](spell/hide_from_undead), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,000 gp
This stone grants a +2 competence bonus on Knowledge (religion) checks to identify undead and their special abilities.
+2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks against undead.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [hide from undead](spell/hide_from_undead), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 75 gp

gold_nodule.name: Gold Nodule
description: This stone grants you the ability to comprehend, speak, read, and write a single language (chosen by the ioun stone's creator).
+1 bonus on saves against language-dependent effects.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [tongues](spell/tongues), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,500 gp
This stone grants you the ability to comprehend and read, but not speak or write, a single language (chosen by the ioun stone's creator).
+1 bonus on saves against language-dependent effects.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [tongues](spell/tongues), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Linguistics checks.
+1 bonus on saves against language-dependent effects.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [tongues](spell/tongues), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 75 gp

This stone grants you a +5 competence bonus on checks with one Knowledge skill (chosen by the stone's creator).
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Appraise checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,500 gp

This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Appraise checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 800 gp

pale_ruby_trillian.name: Pale Ruby Trillian
description: This stone grants you a +5 competence bonus on Stealth checks.
Increase by 10 feet the distance the bearer may fall safely (stacks with other effects that increase this distance, such as making Acrobatics checks or falling into water).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,500 gp
This stone grants a +5 competence bonus on Stealth checks and -2 penalty to Dexterity.
Increase by 10 feet the distance the bearer may fall safely (stacks with other effects that increase this distance, such as making Acrobatics checks or falling into water).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 800 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Stealth checks.
Increase by 10 feet the distance the bearer may fall safely (stacks with other effects that increase this distance, such as making Acrobatics checks or falling into water).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 100 gp

turquoise_sphere.name: Turquoise Sphere
description: This stone grants you a +5 competence bonus on Ride checks. Any horse or pony you ride gains the benefits of the Fleet feat.
+2 competence bonus on Handle Animal checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [charm animal](spell/charm_animal), [longstrider](spell/longstrider), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,000 gp
This stone grants a +5 competence bonus to Ride checks.
+2 competence bonus on Handle Animal checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [charm animal](spell/charm_animal), [longstrider](spell/longstrider), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,500 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Ride checks.
+2 competence bonus on Handle Animal checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [charm animal](spell/charm_animal), [longstrider](spell/longstrider), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 100 gp

dark_blue_rhomboid.name: Dark Blue Rhomboid
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)

The wearer no longer takes penalties on Perception checks for being distracted or asleep; while asleep, the wearer can remain open-eyed and fully aware of his environment, though he is still helpless against undetected threats until he actually wakes up.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Perception and Sense motive checks.

The wearer no longer takes penalties on Perception checks for being distracted or asleep; while asleep, the wearer can remain open-eyed and fully aware of his environment, though he is still helpless against undetected threats until he actually wakes up.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 200 gp
This stone grants a +2 competence bonus on Perception checks and a -1 penalty to initiative checks.

The wearer no longer takes penalties on Perception checks for being distracted or asleep; while asleep, the wearer can remain open-eyed and fully aware of his environment, though he is still helpless against undetected threats until he actually wakes up.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 150 gp

mulberry_pentacle.name: Mulberry Pentacle
description: This stone grants you a +5 competence bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks.
+2 competence bonus on Sense Motive checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
This stone grants a +5 competence bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks and a -2 penalty on Will saving throws.
+2 competence bonus on Sense Motive checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,350 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks.
+2 competence bonus on Sense Motive checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 200 gp

vermilion_rhomboid.name: Vermilion Rhomboid
description: This stone grants you a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Swim checks.
Breathe water for up to 10 minutes per day, useable in 1-minute increments.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
This stone grants a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Swim checks and a -2 penalty to Constitution.
Breathe water for up to 10 minutes per day, useable in 1-minute increments.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Swim checks.
Breathe water for up to 10 minutes per day, useable in 1-minute increments.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 200 gp

agate_ellipsoid.name: Agate Ellipsoid
description: This stone grants you a single use of the augury spell with a 100% success rate. The stone must have been orbiting your head for at least 24 hours before it can be activated in such a way, which you can do with a thought as a free action. The stone instantly returns an answer of "weal," "woe," "weal and woe," or "nothing." After being used in this manner, the stone loses all magical power and becomes a dull gray ioun stone.
Increases the caster level of divination spells by 1.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [augury](spell/augury), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp
This stone functions as a normal agate ellipsoid ioun stone, but you lose any abilities to reroll ability checks, skill checks, or saving throws for 24 hours after equipping it.
Increases the caster level of divination spells by 1.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [augury](spell/augury), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 400 gp
This stone grants you a single use of augury with an 80% success rate. It otherwise functions as a normal agate ellipsoid ioun stone.
Increases the caster level of divination spells by 1.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [augury](spell/augury), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 250 gp

dusty_rose_prism.name: Dusty Rose Prism
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
+1 insight bonus on combat maneuver checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,500 gp
This stone grants a +1 insight bonus to AC and a -2 penalty to Strength.
+1 insight bonus on combat maneuver checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on initiative checks.
+1 insight bonus on combat maneuver checks.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 250 gp

iridescent_spindle.name: Iridescent Spindle
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
The wearer gains the constant effects of endure elements and takes only half damage from exposure to vacuum and underwater pressure.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 9,000 gp
This stone sustains the wearer without air, but he is always staggered.
The wearer gains the constant effects of endure elements and takes only half damage from exposure to vacuum and underwater pressure.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp
This stone grants a +4 competence bonus on Constitution checks to hold your breath.
The wearer gains the constant effects of endure elements and takes only half damage from exposure to vacuum and underwater pressure.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 250 gp

tourmaline_sphere.name: Tourmaline Sphere
description: **Source** [Pathfinder #122: Into the Shattered Continent pg. 21](source/pathfinder_#122_into_the_shattered_continent), [Pathfinder Society Primer pg. 23](source/pathfinder_society_primer)

This stone grants you a benefit when you're dying. When determining the number of negative hit points you must accrue to die, treat your Constitution score as if it were 2 higher. This doesn't provide a bonus to Constitution, so it doesn't grant a bonus on checks to stabilize, but it does provide you 2 additional rounds in which you can attempt such checks. You can benefit from only one tourmaline sphere ioun stone at a time.
This stone grants a +1 bonus on Constitution checks to stabilize when dying.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #122: Into the Shattered Continent pg. 21](source/pathfinder_#122_into_the_shattered_continent), [Pathfinder Society Primer pg. 23](source/pathfinder_society_primer)
This stone grants a +1 insight bonus on saving throws against death effects.
This stone grants a +1 bonus on Constitution checks to stabilize when dying.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 400 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #122: Into the Shattered Continent pg. 21](source/pathfinder_#122_into_the_shattered_continent), [Pathfinder Society Primer pg. 23](source/pathfinder_society_primer)
This stone functions as a normal tourmaline sphere ioun stone, but you take a -1 penalty on Constitution checks to stabilize when dying.
This stone grants a +1 bonus on Constitution checks to stabilize when dying.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 300 gp

magenta_prism.name: Magenta Prism
description: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to any one ability score of your choosing. The selected ability score can be changed only once per day at a time unique to each stone (typically sunrise or sunset). A stone attuned to a specific ability score maintains that attunement until changed at the specified time of day, regardless of how long it has remained unused or how many times it changes hands.
+1 bonus on one saving throw not modified by the ability score the stone is currently attuned to (chosen at the same time as the ability score).

**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), [owl's wisdom](spell/owl's_wisdom), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 8,000 gp

This stone functions as a normal magenta prism ioun stone that has 4 charges. Changing the ability score modified uses 1 charge, and the stone loses the ability to change when reduced to 0 charges, though it still grants a bonus to the ability score to which it was last changed.
+1 bonus on one saving throw not modified by the ability score the stone is currently attuned to (chosen at the same time as the ability score).

**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), [owl's wisdom](spell/owl's_wisdom), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp
This stone grants you a +2 competence bonus on checks with any one skill you choose, and you can change the skill modified once per day, as a normal magenta prism ioun stone.
+1 bonus on one saving throw not modified by the ability score the stone is currently attuned to (chosen at the same time as the ability score).

**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), [eagle's splendor](spell/eagle's_splendor), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), [owl's wisdom](spell/owl's_wisdom), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 400 gp

clear_spindle.name: Clear Spindle
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Sustains creature without food or water.

The wearer can cast protection from chaos/evil/good/law on himself once per day (CL 12th). He can activate this ability as an immediate action, but doing so drains the ioun stone of its magic, turning it into a dull gray ioun stone.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,000 gp
This stone sustains the wearer without food but he must consume twice the normal amount of water.

The wearer can cast protection from chaos/evil/good/law on himself once per day (CL 12th). He can activate this ability as an immediate action, but doing so drains the ioun stone of its magic, turning it into a dull gray ioun stone.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,000 gp
This stone sustains the wearer on half the normal amount of food.

The wearer can cast protection from chaos/evil/good/law on himself once per day (CL 12th). He can activate this ability as an immediate action, but doing so drains the ioun stone of its magic, turning it into a dull gray ioun stone.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp

nacreous_gray_sphere.name: Nacreous Gray Sphere
description: This stone protects you from ability score penalties from aging and you cannot be magically aged. Any penalties you have already incurred remain in place. Bonuses still accrue, and you still die of old age when your time is up. If you lose the stone or its abilities are negated in some way, all age and penalties apply immediately.
Miss chance against incorporeal creatures decreases to 25%.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp

This stone protects the wearer from one type of ability damage (such as Strength or Constitution) caused by natural or magical aging. It otherwise functions as a normal nacreous gray sphere ioun stone.
Miss chance against incorporeal creatures decreases to 25%.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,700 gp

Protects wearer from appearing older but does not protect against ability damage from aging. The stone remembers the wearer's age at the time he first wore it and always restores his appearance to that age, even if he hasn't worn it for years or it has been worn by other people.
Miss chance against incorporeal creatures decreases to 25%.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp

orange_prism.name: Orange Prism
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Every time the bearer casts a spell, he rolls 1d4-2 and adds the result (as well as the +1 caster level granted by the normal power of the ioun stone) to his caster level.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 15,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 caster level and a -2 penalty to the wearer's primary casting ability score (Wisdom for clerics, Intelligence for wizards, and so on).
Every time the bearer casts a spell, he rolls 1d4-2 and adds the result (as well as the +1 caster level granted by the normal power of the ioun stone) to his caster level.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12,500 gp
Wearer adds one cantrip or orison (determined when the stone is created) to his list of spells known or spells prepared.
Every time the bearer casts a spell, he rolls 1d4-2 and adds the result (as well as the +1 caster level granted by the normal power of the ioun stone) to his caster level.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 500 gp

pink_rhomboid.name: Pink Rhomboid
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
This stone grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution and -2 penalty to Dexterity.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,000 gp
This stone grants a +4 competence bonus on one type of check affected by the [Endurance](feat/endurance) feat.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 700 gp

scarlet_and_green_cabochon.name: Scarlet and Green Cabochon
description: ### Scarlet and Green Cabochon (Normal) Ioun Stone
This stone grants you the [Endurance](feat/endurance) feat.
+5 bonus on Constitution checks made to stabilize.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
### Scarlet and Green Cabochon (Flawed) Ioun Stone

This stone grants the wearer the [Endurance](feat/endurance) feat. Anything that would make the wearer fatigued instead makes him sickened. Anything that would make the wearer exhausted instead makes him nauseated.
+5 bonus on Constitution checks made to stabilize.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
### Scarlet and Green Cabochon (Cracked) Ioun Stone
This stone grants a +4 bonus on one type of check affected by the [Endurance](feat/endurance) feat.
+5 bonus on Constitution checks made to stabilize.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bull's strength](spell/bull's_strength), [cat's grace](spell/cat's_grace), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 700 gp

gamboge_nodule.name: Gamboge Nodule
description: This stone grants you immunity to poison, as if wearing a periapt of proof against poison.
+2 resistance bonus on saving throws against disease.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [neutralize poison](spell/neutralize_poison), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 27,000 gp
This stone grants immunity to poison and a -4 penalty on saving throws against curses and diseases.
+2 resistance bonus on saving throws against disease.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [neutralize poison](spell/neutralize_poison), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 20,000 gp
This stone grants immunity to one kind of poison, such as arsenic or scorpion venom.
+2 resistance bonus on saving throws against disease.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [neutralize poison](spell/neutralize_poison), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 750 gp

opalescent_white_pyramid.name: Opalescent White Pyramid
description: Each stone of this type is keyed to a particular kind of weapon (heavy flail, light crossbow, short sword, and so on) and grants you proficiency with that weapon.
[Weapon Focus](feat/weapon_focus) with the stone's keyed weapon.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [transformation](spell/transformation) or proficiency in the appropriate weapon, creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
This stone grants proficiency with the keyed weapon and gives the wearer a -2 penalty to Dexterity.
[Weapon Focus](feat/weapon_focus) with the stone's keyed weapon.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [transformation](spell/transformation) or proficiency in the appropriate weapon, creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,500 gp
The stone grants the wearer weapon familiarity with the keyed weapon (it is treated as a martial weapon for him).
[Weapon Focus](feat/weapon_focus) with the stone's keyed weapon.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [transformation](spell/transformation) or proficiency in the appropriate weapon, creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 750 gp

pale_orange_rhomboid.name: Pale Orange Rhomboid
description: This stone absorbs your soul as the magic jar spell immediately prior to your death. You can't transfer your soul from the ioun stone receptacle to another creature's body, and are, for all intents and purposes, dead. While your soul is in the ioun stone, you can sense any life forces within 120 feet as though you were placed in a magic jar. At any point within 12 hours of your soul's transfer into as long as it is within 120 feet of the ioun stone. Upon returning to your body, you are unconscious and dying with a number of negative hit points equal to your Constitution score minus 1. If you fail to stabilize and aren't healed after 1 turn, you die and your soul is not absorbed by the ioun stone. Your soul can be absorbed into a pale orange rhombus ioun stone only once per 24-hour period.

A soul held within the stone can remain there indefinitely as long as the wayfinder remains on the soul's original body. If the wayfinder is removed from the body, the ioun stone's resonant power is suppressed until the wayfinder is replaced.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [magic jar](spell/magic_jar), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 100,000 gp
This stone functions as a normal pale orange rhomboid, but only once, after which it burns out and turns dull gray.

A soul held within the stone can remain there indefinitely as long as the wayfinder remains on the soul's original body. If the wayfinder is removed from the body, the ioun stone's resonant power is suppressed until the wayfinder is replaced.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [magic jar](spell/magic_jar), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp
If you die while using this ioun stone, the stone can be used as an additional material component in any spell to return you to life, reducing the spell's total material component cost by 20%.

A soul held within the stone can remain there indefinitely as long as the wayfinder remains on the soul's original body. If the wayfinder is removed from the body, the ioun stone's resonant power is suppressed until the wayfinder is replaced.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [magic jar](spell/magic_jar), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 900 gp

emerald_ellipsoid.name: Emerald Ellipsoid
description: This stone grants you 5 temporary hit points, which are restored automatically at a specific time of day unique to each stone (typically sunrise or sunset). The bonuses from multiple emerald ellipsoids stack, with no known limit.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [false life](spell/false_life), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 10,000 gp

This stone grants the wearer 5 temporary hit points (stacking to 25 for multiple emerald ellipsoids of any kind), which are restored automatically at a specific time of day unique to each stone (typically sunrise or sunset). Each stone inflicts one negative level upon you (no known limit); these negative levels remain as long as the stone is in use, and disappear when it is no longer in use. These negative levels never result in actual level loss, but they cannot be overcome in any way while the stone is used.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [false life](spell/false_life), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp

This stone grants 1 temporary hit point, which is restored automatically at a specific time of day unique to each stone (typically sunrise or sunset). The bonuses from multiple cracked emerald ellipsoids stack (limit 5 temporary hit points).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [false life](spell/false_life), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,000 gp

vibrant_purple_prism.name: Vibrant Purple Prism
description: This stone stores three levels of spells, as a ring of spell storing (minor), except casting spells out of the stone requires at least a full-round action.

As a standard action, the bearer can expend a stored spell to refresh a cast spell of the same level as if using a pearl of power. The bearer can refresh up to 3 spell levels per day using this ability.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 18,000 gp
**Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Stores three levels of spells, as a ring of spell storing.

As a standard action, the bearer can expend a stored spell to refresh a cast spell of the same level as if using a pearl of power. The bearer can refresh up to 3 spell levels per day using this ability.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 18,000 gp
This stone stores one spell level, as a ring of spell storing (minor).

As a standard action, the bearer can expend a stored spell to refresh a cast spell of the same level as if using a pearl of power. The bearer can refresh up to 3 spell levels per day using this ability.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,000 gp

pale_lavender_ellipsoid.name: Pale Lavender Ellipsoid
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Absorbs spells of 4th level or lower. After absorbing 20 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns to dull gray, forever useless.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 10,000 gp

This stone absorbs spells of 3rd level or lower, which deals 2 hit points of damage to the user for each spell level absorbed. After absorbing 20 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns dull gray.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 9,000 gp
This stone absorbs spells of 1st level or lower. After absorbing 5 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns dull gray.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,250 gp

brown_thorny.name: Brown Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on trip attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
The flawed version of a thorny ioun stone of any type functions as the normal version, but the wearer also takes a -2 penalty to CMD against the corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp
A cracked thorny ioun stone provides a +1 competence bonus on its corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

crimson_thorny.name: Crimson Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on bull rush attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
The flawed version of a thorny ioun stone of any type functions as the normal version, but the wearer also takes a -2 penalty to CMD against the corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp
A cracked thorny ioun stone provides a +1 competence bonus on its corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

orange_thorny.name: Orange Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on sunder attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp

**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp

**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

silver_thorny.name: Silver Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on overrun attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
The flawed version of a thorny ioun stone of any type functions as the normal version, but the wearer also takes a -2 penalty to CMD against the corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp
A cracked thorny ioun stone provides a +1 competence bonus on its corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

teal_thorny.name: Teal Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on disarm attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
The flawed version of a thorny ioun stone of any type functions as the normal version, but the wearer also takes a -2 penalty to CMD against the corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp
A cracked thorny ioun stone provides a +1 competence bonus on its corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

violet_thorny.name: Violet Thorny
description: Used by warriors of ancient Azlant, these strangely shaped ioun stones are popular with combat-savvy members of the [Pathfinder Society](rule/aff_scholars). These variant ioun stones resemble a thorny sphere-each possesses a circular shape with dozens of needle-like points jutting out. Each type of stone is a different color and grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on checks for a specific combat maneuver. All varieties of thorny ioun stone have the same price and cost.
This ioun stone grants a +2 competence bonus on grapple attempts.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp
The flawed version of a thorny ioun stone of any type functions as the normal version, but the wearer also takes a -2 penalty to CMD against the corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,450 gp
A cracked thorny ioun stone provides a +1 competence bonus on its corresponding type of combat maneuver check.
Grants the bearer the benefit of either the [Acrobatic](feat/acrobatic) or the [Athletic](feat/athletic) feat. The feat varies by individual ioun stone, and each is equally likely (50% chance).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,600 gp

amber_spindle.name: Amber Spindle
description: This stone grants you a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. The bonuses from multiple amber spindles stack (up to a maximum of a +5 resistance bonus to saving throws).
5% chance per Reflex saving throw of granting the wearer evasion against that effect; bonuses from multiple amber spindles stack.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [resistance](spell/resistance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws per stone, stacking up to +3 total with other amber spindle ioun stones (flawed or otherwise).
5% chance per Reflex saving throw of granting the wearer evasion against that effect; bonuses from multiple amber spindles stack.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [resistance](spell/resistance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 3,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 resistance bonus on Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saves. The bonuses from multiple amber spindles (cracked or otherwise) stack, up to a maximum of a +5 resistance bonus.
5% chance per Reflex saving throw of granting the wearer evasion against that effect; bonuses from multiple amber spindles stack.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [resistance](spell/resistance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,700 gp

pearly_white_spindle.name: Pearly White Spindle
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Regenerate 1 point of damage per 10 minutes.
+2 sacred bonus on saves against death effects and attacks that rely on negative energy.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 10,000 gp
The user regenerates 4 points of damage per hour.
+2 sacred bonus on saves against death effects and attacks that rely on negative energy.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 9,000 gp
Regenerate 1 point of damage per hour.
+2 sacred bonus on saves against death effects and attacks that rely on negative energy.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 1,700 gp

pale_green_prism.name: Pale Green Prism
description: **Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
+1 competence bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.
Twice per day as a free action, the bearer can remove the fatigued condition from himself (or reduce the exhausted condition to fatigued).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 15,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.
Twice per day as a free action, the bearer can remove the fatigued condition from himself (or reduce the exhausted condition to fatigued).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 14,000 gp
This stone grants a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls or saving throws.
Twice per day as a free action, the bearer can remove the fatigued condition from himself (or reduce the exhausted condition to fatigued).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 2,000 gp

western_star.name: Western Star
description: This blue crystal is cut in the shape of a five-pointed star. As a standard action, its user can alter his appearance as with a disguise self spell. When so disguised, the user can render the western star and other ioun stones in his possession invisible.

eastern_star.name: Eastern Star
description: **Source** [The Emerald Spire Superdungeon pg. 129](source/the_emerald_spire_superdungeon), [Occult Mysteries pg. 29](source/occult_mysteries)
This red crystal is perfectly cut in the shape of a five-pointed star. Its user understands spoken languages, and reads as if under the effects of comprehend languages.

azure_briolette.name: Azure Briolette
sources: Pathfinder #125 Tower of the Drowned Dead
description: **Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 36](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)

This pear-shaped ioun stone sparkles in a brilliant blue color. Whenever a creature fails a saving throw against a mind-affecting spell cast by this ioun stone's user, the user gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the targeted creature's Charisma bonus (minimum 0) until the start of the user's next turn. These temporary hit points do not stack. The user doesn't gain temporary hit points from a creature that voluntarily fails its saving throw against the spell.

This stone allows the user to pick up on psychic resonance from corpses. So long as the user has carried the ioun stone continuously for at least 24 hours, the first three corpses touched by the user each day babble residual psychic impressions into the bearer's mind. This functions as the [grave words](spell/grave_words) spell, except that only the user can hear the corpse speak.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 7,500 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 36](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)
This stone functions as normal, but the number of temporary hit points gained from the azure briolette ioun stone cannot exceed the user's Charisma bonus (minimum 0).

This stone allows the user to pick up on psychic resonance from corpses. So long as the user has carried the ioun stone continuously for at least 24 hours, the first three corpses touched by the user each day babble residual psychic impressions into the bearer's mind. This functions as the [grave words](spell/grave_words) spell, except that only the user can hear the corpse speak.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 7,000 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 36](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)
This stone grants only 1 temporary hit point, even if the target's Charisma bonus is higher than 1.

This stone allows the user to pick up on psychic resonance from corpses. So long as the user has carried the ioun stone continuously for at least 24 hours, the first three corpses touched by the user each day babble residual psychic impressions into the bearer's mind. This functions as the [grave words](spell/grave_words) spell, except that only the user can hear the corpse speak.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp

dark_green_rhomboid.name: Dark Green Rhomboid
description: This ioun stone is forest green with flecks of yellow. At all times, it allows you to immediately notice any poison within 5 feet of you. This effect is otherwise identical to the detect poison spell.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [detect poison](spell/detect_poison), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp

southern_star.name: Southern Star
description: This brilliant, deep violet crystal is perfectly cut in the shape of a five-pointed star. The gem grants its bearer a swim speed of 30 feet. When inserted into a wayfinder, it allows the bearer to breathe water for up to 10 minutes per day (in 1-minute increments).
Can breath water for 10 minutes a day
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [touch of the sea](spell/touch_of_the_sea), creator must be at least 12th level; **Cost** 4,000 gp

deep_brown_sphere.name: Deep Brown Sphere
description: This deep brown ioun stone is streaked with amber and looks much like a tiger's eye gem save for its perfectly spherical shape. While using this stone, you know at all times exactly how many feet you are under or above sea level.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [discern location](spell/discern_location), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp

lavender_and_green_ellipsoid.name: Lavender and Green Ellipsoid
description: ### Lavender and Green Ellipsoid (Normal) Ioun Stone
**Source** [Adventurer's Guide pg. 149](source/adventurer's_guide), [PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 521](source/prpg_core_rulebook), [Ultimate Equipment pg. 305](source/ultimate_equipment)
Absorbs spells of 8th level or lower. After absorbing 50 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns dull gray, forever useless.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 20,000 gp
### Lavender and Green Ellipsoid (Flawed) Ioun Stone

This stone absorbs spells of 6th level or lower, which deals 2 hit points of damage to the wearer for each spell level absorbed. After absorbing 50 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns dull gray.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 18,000 gp
### Lavender and Green Ellipsoid (Cracked) Ioun Stone
This stone absorbs spells of 2nd level or lower. After absorbing 10 spell levels, the stone burns out and turns dull gray.
If the bearer is holding the wayfinder, he can use the stone's absorption ability as an immediate action instead of a readied action.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp

northern_star.name: Northern Star
description: This pearlescent crystal is perfectly cut in the shape of a five-pointed star. It grants the bearer a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks. When inserted into a wayfinder, it grants the bearer a +4 bonus on Reflex saves to avoid falling.
+4 bonus on Reflex Saves to avoid falling
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [jump](spell/jump), creator must be at least 12th level; **Cost** 5,000 gp

crimson_sphere.name: Crimson Sphere
description: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence. The bonuses from multiple crimson spheres stack (up to a maximum of a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence).
+1 competence bonus on single Knowledge skill (chosen by the stone's creator).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12,000 gp
This stone grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence per stone, stacking up to +4 total. These stones do not stack with non-flawed crimson sphere ioun stones.
+1 competence bonus on single Knowledge skill (chosen by the stone's creator).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 8,000 gp

Individually these have no effect; when used in pairs, each pair grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence. The bonuses from multiple crimson spheres (cracked or otherwise) stack, up to a maximum of a +6 enhancement bonus.
+1 competence bonus on single Knowledge skill (chosen by the stone's creator).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [fox's cunning](spell/fox's_cunning), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp

onyx_rhomboid.name: Onyx Rhomboid
description: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution. The enhancement bonuses from multiple onyx rhomboids stack (up to a maximum of a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution).
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12,000 gp
This stone grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution per stone, stacking up to +4 total. These stones do not stack with non-flawed onyx rhomboid ioun stones.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 8,000 gp
Individually has no effect; when used in pairs, each pair grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution. The bonuses from multiple stones (cracked or otherwise) stack, up to a maximum of a +6 bonus.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [bear's endurance](spell/bear's_endurance), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp

silver_spindle.name: Silver Spindle
description: This stone grants you the ability to use a 1st-level spell from the cleric, druid, or sorcerer/wizard spell list as a spell-like ability three times per day, using your character level as your caster level. The spell keyed to the ioun stone is selected by the stone's creator. In order for you to use this spell-like ability, you must have a Charisma score of 11 or higher. The save DCs of the chosen spell are Charisma-based, if any.
All spell-like abilities granted by race are treated as 1 caster level higher.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [imbue with spell ability](spell/imbue_with_spell_ability), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 12,000 gp
This stone functions as a normal silver spindle ioun stone, but it deals 1d3 Charisma damage to you each time you use the spell-like ability.
All spell-like abilities granted by race are treated as 1 caster level higher.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [imbue with spell ability](spell/imbue_with_spell_ability), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 8,000 gp
This stone functions as a normal silver spindle ioun stone, but instead grants a 0-level spell.
All spell-like abilities granted by race are treated as 1 caster level higher.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), [imbue with spell ability](spell/imbue_with_spell_ability), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 6,000 gp

emerald_wedge.name: Emerald Wedge
description: An emerald wedge ioun stone is a bit larger than most ioun stones. This ioun stone grants a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom; it grants ranks in Use Magic Device as a side effect of its Intelligence bonus. Zinlun's emerald wedge ioun stone is wedged in a crack in his skull, and he can use this magic item as his arcane bond. For all other creatures, it functions as a normal ioun stone that floats in the air about the user's head.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level.; **Cost** 16,000 gp

pearlescent_pyramid.name: Pearlescent Pyramid
sources: Pathfinder #125 Tower of the Drowned Dead
description: **Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 31](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)

This ioun stone resembles a small, pearl-white tetrahedron. This stone grants the [ghost touch](magic-enhancement/ghost_touch_weapon) special ability to the user's unarmed strikes and to melee weapons she wields. The user can also focus her gaze as a standard action and gain the benefits of [see invisibility](spell/see_invisibility) for 1 round. If the user is incorporeal, corporeal melee weapons she touches gain the ghost touch special ability, allowing her to pick up and use corporeal melee weapons as normal.

This stone grants the [ghost touch](magic-enhancement/ghost_touch_armor) special ability to normal or masterwork light armor the user has worn for at least 24 hours. This benefit lasts as long as the armor is in the user's possession.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 24,000 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 31](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)
This stone functions as normal, but it doesn't grant the user the benefits of [see invisibility](spell/see_invisibility).

This stone grants the [ghost touch](magic-enhancement/ghost_touch_armor) special ability to normal or masterwork light armor the user has worn for at least 24 hours. This benefit lasts as long as the armor is in the user's possession.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 22,500 gp
**Source** [Pathfinder #125: Tower of the Drowned Dead pg. 31](source/pathfinder_#125_tower_of_the_drowned_dead)

This stone functions as normal, but the user's unarmed strikes and melee weapons lose all enhancement bonuses and other weapon special abilities except for the ghost touch special ability granted by this stone (although a magic weapon that loses its enhancement bonuses still counts as a magic weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction).

This stone grants the [ghost touch](magic-enhancement/ghost_touch_armor) special ability to normal or masterwork light armor the user has worn for at least 24 hours. This benefit lasts as long as the armor is in the user's possession.
**Requirements** [Craft Wondrous Item](feat/craft_wondrous_item), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 16,000 gp

sepia_ellipsoid.name: Sepia Ellipsoid
description: This dark stone sometimes appears to be made of transparent crystal filled nearly to the brim with dark ink. It provides the benefits of an iridescent spindle (sustains you without air), pearly white spindle (regenerate 1 hit point per 10 minutes), and an orange prism (+1 caster level). However, it has two drawbacks. First, once set loose to orbit your head, it dislikes being contained (including being placed in a wayfinder) and frees itself to orbit again 1d4+1 hours after being removed from its spinning path. Second, it drains the power out of other ioun stones, rendering them dull gray and powerless at a rate of one every 24 hours. Thus, it is an excellent and valuable item if you only have one ioun stone, but hard to conceal and dangerous to your other treasures. A remove curse or similar spell can put the stone at rest and prevent it from returning to its orbit.

The Society has at least three specimens of this type locked in the Vaults to prevent ignorant Pathfinders from ruining perfectly good ioun stones. In theory you could place one directly into a wayfinder rather than ever letting it orbit, though conflicting reports suggest the sepia ellipsoid may be able to drain power out of orbiting stones even when contained in this way. The specimens in the Vaults are carefully locked in lead boxes to prevent them from draining the powers of other stored ioun stones.

**Requirements** [Craft Magic Arms and Armor](feat/craft_magic_arms_and_armor), [mage's disjunction](spell/mage's_disjunction), [regenerate](spell/regenerate), [water breathing](spell/water_breathing), creator must be 12th level; **Cost** 34,000 gp
